explanation: [0-0] A pink cartoon fox wearing a crown, with a smile on its face, raises both hands, extending its index fingers to point at three types of food above its head. From left to right are: an apple, a bowl of salad, and a piece of meat on the bone. As the fox's fingers move up and down, the food lights up with a yellow halo in turn.

[0-6] Subsequently, the apple pattern lights up with a yellow halo again, and a plate of apples appears in front of the fox. The fox picks up an apple with its right hand and takes a bite, its eyes turning into black crescents, its mouth closed, chewing continuously. Then it opens its eyes and chews with its mouth closed, chewing with its mouth slightly open, and you can see the apple in its mouth. Its tail is also wagging behind it.

[0-6] Subsequently, the apple pattern lights up with a yellow halo again, and a plate of apples appears in front of the fox. The fox picks up an apple with its right hand and takes a bite, its eyes turning into black crescents, its mouth closed, chewing continuously. Then it opens its eyes and chews with its mouth closed, chewing with its mouth slightly open, and you can see the apple in its mouth. Its tail is also wagging behind it.

Then it opens its eyes and chews with its mouth closed, chewing with its mouth slightly open, and you can see the apple in its mouth. Its tail is also wagging behind it.

Then it opens its eyes and chews with its mouth closed, chewing with its mouth slightly open, and you can see the apple in its mouth. Its tail is also wagging behind it.

Then it opens its eyes and chews with its mouth closed, chewing with its mouth slightly open, and you can see the apple in its mouth. Its tail is also wagging behind it.

[0-6] Subsequently, the apple pattern lights up with a yellow halo again, and a plate of apples appears in front of the fox. The fox picks up an apple with its right hand and takes a bite, its eyes turning into black crescents, its mouth closed, chewing continuously. Then it opens its eyes and chews with its mouth closed, chewing with its mouth slightly open, and you can see the apple in its mouth. Its tail is also wagging behind it.

[6-10] As the salad pattern in the middle lights up with a yellow halo, the apple disappears, and a large bowl of salad takes its place. The salad has green vegetables, red tomatoes, and more. The fox holds a blue fork in its right hand, forks up a piece of vegetable and puts it in its mouth, closes its eyes, and chews. It makes a fist with its left hand and raises it to its chest, chewing while alternately raising and lowering its hands, and its head is also swaying left and right, and finally its ears move.

[6-10] As the salad pattern in the middle lights up with a yellow halo, the apple disappears, and a large bowl of salad takes its place. The salad has green vegetables, red tomatoes, and more. The fox holds a blue fork in its right hand, forks up a piece of vegetable and puts it in its mouth, closes its eyes, and chews. The fox holds a blue fork in its right hand, forks up a piece of vegetable and puts it in its mouth, closes its eyes, and chews. It makes a fist with its left hand and raises it to its chest, chewing while alternately raising and lowering its hands, and its head is also swaying left and right, and finally its ears move.

[6-10] As the salad pattern in the middle lights up with a yellow halo, the apple disappears, and a large bowl of salad takes its place. The salad has green vegetables, red tomatoes, and more. The fox holds a blue fork in its right hand, forks up a piece of vegetable and puts it in its mouth, closes its eyes, and chews. It makes a fist with its left hand and raises it to its chest, chewing while alternately raising and lowering its hands, and its head is also swaying left and right, and finally its ears move.

[10-16] After that, the meat on the bone lights up with a yellow halo, and a black grill appears in front of the fox, with several square pieces of meat and three cloves of garlic on it. Smoke rises above as it cooks. It picks up the leftmost piece of meat on the screen with chopsticks in its right hand and puts it down again, then picks up the second piece of meat on the left side of the screen and puts it into its mouth. It chews with its mouth open and then closes its eyes, its head swaying from side to side.
